description: Keeping up with the daily chores of a firehouse is tedious anddemanding, so as Fabrice, Antal Posza (aka Niklos), Wolf Remulus(aka Stefan) and Christophe work on the truck they decide to take abreak and settle in for a furious four-way of fire-pole abandon. Theylick finger suck and rim, finally settling down onto each others cocksas the heat builds to a four-alarm fire which can only be quenched bytheir thick jets of cum. Hoses need daily maintenance too!
title: Fire Pump, Scene #05
